title: Z for Zachariah
description: A gripping, thought-provoking story about life after a nuclear holocaust, by a Newbery Medalist. Nuclear war has devastated America, except for the valley where Ann, a sixteen-year-old girl has been living alone, until a scientist in a radiation-proof suit arrives. She is relieved to see him arrive into her valley until she realizes that he is a tyrant and she must somehow escape.
author: Robert C. O'Brien
